Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

Dose response curves indicated a highly potent binding to 2PT-NBD1 and F508del-2PT-NBD1 (EC50 in the 1 nM to 50 nM range) for all nanobodies, except nanobody G3a, which displayed a weaker binding potency (Fig. la,e).
In each case the titrations were consistent with a 1:1 bimolecular association between nanobodies and monomeric 2PT-NBD1 with KΏ values of 54 ± 10, 25 ± 10, 37.9 ± 7, and 39 ± 2 nM with nanobodies T2a, T27, T4, and T8 respectively.
Nanobody G3a bound 2PT-NBD1 with a lower affinity (1.1 mM ± 0.1 pM) which is consistent with our determination of apparent affinity by ELISA (Fig. la,e).
